'''''Cool Runnings''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 3 [[Warrior's Challenge]]s in [["Masters of the Night-Wind"]] and [[Tezcatepetonco Range]] with a grade of SS.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The challenges can be started by talking to [[Bitsin]] in [["Masters of the Night-Wind"]], and [[Kinne]] and [[Pulmari]] in [[Tezcatepetonco Range]].

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the 1993 {{w|Cool Runnings|film of the same name}}.
